about_the_game:
Crash-landed on the alien world of Hastaris centuries ago, your colony must rise against all odds. In Coloniser, an epic MMORTS inspired by classic isometric RTS games, you’ll build and expand your settlement, forge alliances, and wage wars in a massive, persistent online world filled with rival factions and hostile wildlife.

Progress through eras, unlock new advancements, and wield strategic tactics to secure vital resources and etch your legacy into Hastaris’s treacherous lands. Whether you lead through diplomacy or dominance, Coloniser offers countless ways to shape your story in a world brimming with danger, mystery, and untapped potential.

In Coloniser, your journey begins with the construction and expansion of your settlement. Manage resources, research advancements, and adapt to the ever-changing challenges of Hastaris. As you grow, your colony will face constant decisions about what to build, how to expand, and how to survive in a hostile environment filled with dangers and opportunities.

Whether you're constructing defenses, exploring new territories, or strengthening your economy, every decision impacts the future of your colony. Your growth is limited only by your ability to navigate both the land and the unpredictable rival factions that populate Hastaris.

Coloniser features massive, persistent multiplayer servers that evolve over weeks, offering an RTS experience like no other. Up to (16) players can play concurrently in the demo. Each server allows players to form alliances, trade resources, and engage in fierce battles for supremacy. The world around you is constantly shifting as factions rise and fall, and your decisions influence the ever-changing landscape.

The Coloniser Demo is for the following game mode:

  • Dominion Control: Our main mode where you can lead your faction to dominance in a sprawling, open-world RTS experience.

These servers also support huge battles, where rival factions clash for control of vital resources, landmarks, and territory. Only those with strategic foresight and teamwork will emerge victorious!

Hastaris is a world of mystery, danger, and untold stories. As your colony grows, you’ll uncover the planet’s forgotten history through environmental storytelling, missions, and deciphering cryptic landmarks. The alien biomes, inspired by Earth’s own environments but warped by Hastaris’s evolution, hide both danger and opportunity.

Your faction’s identity shapes your role in this unfolding narrative. Our demo includes the first of these factions, the Keepers.

  • The Keepers: Guardians of the original crash site, clinging to hope for rescue and declaring their land sacred.

Each faction brings a unique perspective to the struggle for survival, creating dynamic rivalries and alliances that define the political and cultural landscape of Hastaris. Every action you take, whether forging alliances or waging war, contributes to the lore of Hastaris.

Survival in Coloniser is more than just a goal, it’s a journey. Every battle, alliance, and decision shapes your legacy in a world full of stories waiting to be written. Will you leave a mark as a fierce conqueror, a wise leader, or an indomitable explorer?

Play now and be part of the next Era of real-time strategy games.

short_description: Build, expand, and conquer in a massive persistent online RTS where survival is key. Progress through eras, forge alliances, and secure resources in an evolving alien world filled with danger, potential, and rich stories to uncover. Engage in large-scale warfare, leading epic battles for dominance!
